verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, I believe,
Help my unbelief.
Lord, I receive,
Help my eyes to see ...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That You have power over death and darkness,
That You have power over death and darkness,
Lord, I believe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The faithless will be true
And the blind shall see;
The dumb shall speak to You
And their song will say ...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The bitter will be sweet
And the lame shall walk;
The hardened heart will bow
And the deaf shall hear ...
